 The movie revolves around the character Glen   
 Manor who has a villa with a secret past and   
 a haunted present.The lead Rehan visits Glen   
 Manor villa to complete the sell transcations, 
 which his father has initiated but couldn't be 
 solved due to certain mysterious incidents.    
 While trying to do, he finds the secret of the 
 villa and falls in love with it.What he does   
 not bargain for is that the secret attacks him 
 to the biggest challenge and question of his   
 life.
